Ready?


TO GET MASTERED: Send me a high quality bounce of your mix using the form below. Make sure to read my post on Preparing Your Mixes For Mastering so that I can get you the best master possible!

TO GET MIXED: Send me your high quality audio tracks, time aligned, by bouncing each track individually from the same point in your session. Here is a tutorial video of how to export tracks as individual audio files from Pro Tools and Logic.
